column5: Next week Ill be in HH for the week, on a family vacation.  My work truck needs some front end work, I need the truck to tow the boat, but after tthat  dont need the truck all week can anyone suggest a good place to bring it in the area of Midland, Pentang, Barrie or even Orillia?  Thanks  Bryan
Adco Tire on Vinden St in Midland. Tell John or Dan that I sent you and they'll take good care of you.  http://adcotireandauto.ca/

Pending the boat size.. someone could even run to the Pete Peterson boat launch dock with the boat and after dropping your truck you can just walk across the road and about 300 feet to the ramp for the ride/fish back to HHarbour.
I will definitely entertain that Wayne.  Thanks for the help.  Bryan
Need specifics I'll do a google earth shot for you..

Adco is the building in the "triangle" with all the dirt parking area surrounding it. The boat launch is clear across the street beside the ball diamond. You can see the walk path to it from behind what is a sales office trailer across the street from Adco.  This narrow channel is beside the sailing club.. dead center as you come in to the bottom of Midland Harbour.
